package.name: ActionBar键盘增强-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Undo, redo, select all, copy, cut and paste actions on bottom of keyboard. ActionBar Free Reborn Edition键盘增强，增加复制、粘贴、撤销按钮，详情请看截图！可以源里搜索键盘获取更多插件！
